Name: Matrix Crystal
AttributesDescription: A data crystal generated by the system's backend, containing challenge-related data. Can be used to redeem event rewards in "Virtual Crisis."
BgDescription: The Tethys System faithfully logs every action in the simulated battleground. These data crystallize into tangible forms, fueling the Stellar Matrices' calculations. Though not in reality, every success and failure paves the way to the future.
ObtainedShowDescription: A data crystal generated by the system's backend, containing challenge-related data. Can be used to redeem event rewards in "Virtual Crisis."
